description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Little Monsters have started appearing everywhere, and now they're starting to run riot.  You must carefully place your bombs to blast them!  This Physics puzzler will provide you with a fun challenge.  6 different types of Monster, ranging from the cute little Fuzzle, to the obnoxious Bloater. A range of other obstacles such as exploding barrels and melting ice will certainly to keep you busy.
